text: "You Should Be Dancing" is a song from 1976. It was written by Barry, Robin and Maurice Gibb. It was performed by the Bee Gees. The band released it as a single in 1976 and was leading song from their album Children of the World and went to number 1 in the United States, number 1 in Canada, number 4 in Ireland, number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 5 in Italy, number 8 in Sweden, number 10 in New Zealand and number 20 in Australia. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Bee Gees songs
title: You Should Be Dancing
